title: lost files through sync
body:
hi, 

i've lost files after synchronization (just in a test scenario - because i had strange behaviors already with 4.5). some of them are in the trash folder, but some (6 out of 1131) are completely vanished.

i've done the following:

1) changed php.ini
- memory_limit = 1032m
- post_max_size = 1032m
- upload_max_filesize = 1024m

2) installed the server 5.0 using default settings and created an additional user

3) installed and configured mac os client 1.2.1 on machine 1

4) installed and configured mac os client 1.2.1 on machine 2 (same local and remote path as machine 1)

5) copied 3 folder containing 1131 files, total 2.5 gb, largest file 245 mb. sync started immediately on client 1 and client 2. at the end i had the following result (performance was ok)

- local directory on machine 1 contained 1125 files
- remote directory on server (data/<user>/files/clientsync contained 1080 files
- trash directory on server (data/<user>/files_trashbin/):
  - ./files : 41 files
  - ./keyfiles: 0 files
  - ./versions: 22 files
  - plus 4 deleted folders 
- local directory on machine 2 contained 1066 files (including the largest one)

is there something i could do to avoid lost files?

thanks
